articles.author: RICARDO ALONSO-ZALDIVAR Associated Press
articles.title: Democratic states appeal Obamacare ruling to Supreme Court
articles.description: Democratic-led states are asking the Supreme Court for a fast-track review of a recent appeals court decision that declared a key part of the Obama-era health law unconstitutional and cast a legal cloud over the rest of the law
articles.content:
WASHINGTON -- 
In a move that could put the Obama-era health law squarely in the middle of the 2020 election, Democratic-led states Friday asked the Supreme Court for a fast-track review of a recent appeals court decision declaring a key part of the law unco… [+1464 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Kentucky man claims he killed, skinned dogs to make coat
articles.description: A Kentucky man who claims to have killed and skinned four of his neighbors' dogs to make a “doggy coat” has been charged with animal torture
articles.content:
PRESTONSBURG, Ky. -- 
A Kentucky man who claimed to have skinned four of his neighbors' dogs to make a doggy coat has been charged with animal torture.

articles.content:

articles.title: Louisiana man gets life sentence for police officer's death
articles.description: A Louisiana man found guilty of murder in the shooting death of a police officer has been formally sentenced to life in prison without the possibility of parole
articles.content:
SHREVEPORT, La. -- 
A Louisiana man found guilty of murder in the shooting death of a police officer will spend the rest of his life in prison without the possibility of parole.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Correction: California Party Shooting story
articles.description: In a story Dec. 31, 2019, about the arrests of six men in the killings of four people at a home in central California, The Associated Press erroneously reported the age of one of the suspects
articles.content:
FRESNO, Calif. -- 
In a story Dec. 31, 2019, about the arrests of six men in the killings of four people at a home in central California, The Associated Press erroneously reported the age of one of the suspects. Pao Vang is 30, not 19.
